title: Five Star Hotel
overview: Five Star Hotel is a reality series where members of the public will be able to brush shoulders with the celebrities and be welcomed in to a wonderland of fun and sunshine as the team waits on the guests hand and foot. As travellers make the most of their summer holiday they will rate the celebrity staff and with the calibre of their work under constant scrutiny the pressure will be on the stars to keep standards high.The celebrities will have to work together to show their guests a good time to keep their Five Star rating. But as the temperatures rise in the Mediterranean, will the celebrities be able to keep their cool under pressure? Will anyone find some summer loving? And will they manage to get up in time to serve breakfast?
